children.text: Just showing off what you can do in this text editor. If you want to quickly delete everything, do ctrl + a and backspace :)
You can write a lot of different stuff here, maybe even...
Something you find interesting about your subject
Just make sure you follow community etiquete regarding entries, in other words be respectful.
Something you may find useful when writing are some keybinds for different text stylings.
Image = ctrl + p (make sure to have included an image url)
If you want to check these again later, visit the entry help page.
This website was developed by someone who has only used windows, so feel free to shoot some advice my way for other platforms. It would be much appreciated :)
